messages.subject: Re: Choosing our Fate (was astrology and tarot)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/20/02 2:37:49 PM Pacific Standard Time, ... Bergen County, NJ,,,,,,,they have this.  It s called a *Blue Law* and it s illegal for most
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/20/02 2:37:49 PM Pacific Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> In my little town here, and elsewhere I'm betting, there are still laws
> on the books that make it illegal to open for business on Sunday.


Bergen County, NJ,,,,,,,they have this. It's called a *Blue Law*
and it's illegal for most retail establishments to operate on Sundays.
Grocery stores can be open, movie theaters and video rental places,
and gas stations, but all other retail stores MUST be closed. I lived
there for two and a half years and really hated it when I'd be shopping
at the grocery store on a Sunday and they'd tell me I couldn't buy the
stickers, coloring books, crayons, etc,,, for my kids because of the
darn blue law.

Andrea Kim :-)
Full Time Mommy to
Laura (2/16/96) & Allison (8/31/99)
Kent, WA,,,,,,,,soon to be Seattle!








[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
